Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
  model.Player
      model.HumanPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
implements Observer

A human player in the tron game. This player is controlled through keyboard input.

Version:
1
Author:
Daniel Hessellund Egeberg, Søren Dahlgaard
